content: c mon eagles fans root for the eagles and make a hat for all of your philadelphia eagles fan friends this hat is knitted in the round and uses light worsted / dk yarn featuring colorwork in three colors for bold graphics size one size for adults gauge 22 0 sts = 4 inches 10 cm needles us 5 and us 6 us 6 double pointed needed for crown shaping yarn light worsted / dk color a cascade yarns ® 220 superwash® in white 871 50g color b cascade yarns ® 220 superwash® in silver grey 1946 7g color c cascade yarns ® 220 superwash® in myrtle heather 296 - 10g
